name: Haunted Hell House
description:
This game is a horror action ADV where you explore a creepy mansion.
You avoid damaging gimmicks and clown and get keys as you go.
Certain objects can be examined, and the perspective becomes first person.
You can return to the title screen from the menu screen.

You can use keyboard or XBOX360 and PS4 controller to control the game.
Save the game automatically when you switch stages.
Japanese and English are available, and you can switch between them on the title screen.
The game can be made full-screen by pressing the F1 key.

October 22, 2022 Episode 2 added.
